about_the_game:
Rumors have it that Inquisitor Augustine has lost his mind and become fixated on witch-hunting. People are terrified!

Step into the shoes of the Vatican’s secret agent and travel to Spain to the isolated village of Portonero to bring an end to this madness! Watch out, though – your trip is going to be long and dangerous. No one is safe from the inquisitor's bloodstained hands. Search the village and its mysterious surroundings, solve numerous challenging puzzles and find useful items.
Are you the one who can bring peace and justice back to the good people of Portonero in this thrilling hidden object puzzle adventure game?



- BONUS CHAPTER "Mark My Words!"
- re-playable MINI-GAMES
- re-playable HIDDEN OBJECT scenes
- ART BOOK and SOUNDTRACK
- complete integrated STRATEGY GUIDE



  • FIND and stop the obsessed inquisitor and his reign of terror
  • INVESTIGATE the isolated village with over 30 enigmatic locations
  • SEARCH for clues and FIND HIDDEN OBJECTS
  • DISCOVER the truth behind the chaos
  • SOLVE hundreds of quests and puzzles
  • HELP people of Portonero village and save them from madness
  • EARN achievements and COLLECT special items
  • ENJOY watching original cinematics about Portonero's past
  • 4 DIFFICULTY MODES: novice, adventure, challenge and custom
  • BEAUTIFUL high definition graphics and an absorbing story line
